title: Marche Tau
description: Part of chain of several health food stores in Quebec. This location is the first one, opened since 1978. Has a kitchen making takeaway food and dessert. Offers a variety of certified organic fruits and vegetable; natural and organic groceries; gluten-free products; babies products; natural cosmetics and skin care; eco-friendly household products; nutritional supplements and vitamins; herbal medicine, homeopathy, and aromatherapy. Onsite naturopathic doctors and health advisors available as well as a cosmetician.
